thread.title: quick trip
thread.title_full: quick trip - Review of Holiday Inn New York City - Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: SherriBuggage
title: quick trip
text:
I work in the city and stayed here due to my crazy work schedule. I got off late and had to work a double the next day.
The guy that checked me in, the loyalty champion was extremely nice and I received a very warm welcome. I let him know that I was here only a few hours to sleep and preferred a room on a low floor. (the elevators can be quite a wait) he was able to move some things around to get me on a low floor. (the woman next to him on the other hand had a typical New York attitude).
The hotel is in walking distance to Times Square and there are many places to eat around the area. (Personally I would steer clear of 9th Ave after 11PM near Port Authority).
The room was very quaint and the bed was extremely cozy. Shower is amazing.
